meanings.definition: Speak irreverently about God or sacred things.
meanings.sent1: He would often blaspheme during his rants against the church.
meanings.sent2: It is considered disrespectful to blaspheme in a place of worship.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's routine included a character who would blaspheme in a humorous way.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to blaspheme the very essence of the sacred space.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti on the church wall seemed to blaspheme the entire community.

meanings.definition: Use the name of God in cursing or profanity.
meanings.sent1: She would blaspheme whenever she was angry.
meanings.sent2: It is not appropriate to blaspheme in public.
meanings.sent3: The children thought it was funny to blaspheme when they were pretending to be pirates.
meanings.sent4: The angry driver's words seemed to blaspheme the peaceful atmosphere of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The movie character's constant blasphemy made the audience uncomfortable.
